articles.title: EU reiterates support to ASEAN’s crafting of Code of Conduct for South China Sea - GMA News
articles.description: The European Union has reiterated its support to the ASEAN-led crafting of the Code of Conduct for the South China Sea, which aims to prevent territorial disputes from escalating into an armed conflict with China.

articles.title: Major blow for England as scans reveal Trent Alexander-Arnold prognosis - Teamtalk.com
articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold has been ruled out of the European Championship after suffering a thigh injury in Wednesday’s friendly win over Austria.

articles.title: Liverpool star Alexander-Arnold 'ruled out' of Euro 2020 - Football365
articles.description: Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold has suffered a "grade two quad tear" so he will miss out on this summer's European Championships.
articles.content:
